name: PaperboyXmas
description:
As I was uploading the game I completely forgot to activate the UI Help/Instructions menu and other UI elements.

*** If you have UI issues, please consider playing on the Web version here ***
https://gamedevklingon.itch.io/paperboyxmas-web

Paperboy Xmas !

You must help Santa to distribute gifts to the children !

Be careful, only give the gift they asked for, or you will lose credibility ;)

How to play
  • Change the gift using the mouse wheel
  • Aim with the mouse
  • Left click to throw a gift !
  • WASD & Space to control the player

The idea was to recreate a version of the Nintendo Classic Paperboy, mixed with brawler actions as in Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 4 on the SNES.

The project was a little bit ambitious considering that I developped it in 28 hours only and was created solo.
Have fun !

If you like the game, you can follow/send me your comments on Twitter and Instagram.
